Reviews.Content: booked hotel daughter quiet main attractions choice stop close hotel 30 minutes ride piazza roma santa lucia hotel nice maintained size bathrooms inclusive breakfast plenty choices suit twin bedded french windows onto garden student daughter delighted 30 minutes free internet access day staff wer helpful spoke english goo italian poor willingly directions restaurants able store luggage day evening flight stay highly recommend

Reviews.Title: “The nicest hotel in Venice!”
Reviews.Author: Tibby27
Reviews.Content: visited venice twelve times past fourteen hotel stayed situated residential near san marco hotel buildings extremely stylish bedrooms impeccable stay bathroom day hotel staff extremely courteous helpful time ive stayed definitely recommend bedroom window 800 am hear italian national anthem played nearby unless drowned church bells breakfasti worry stay wont time

Reviews.Title: “Valuable Alternative to Venice Rip-Off Accomodation”
Reviews.Author: rainbowfishh
Reviews.Content: nicely located enjoy quiet 20 min walk san marco busy day noisy tourists nicely equipped modern stylish interieur clean care friendly staff sufficient rich breakfast buffet value money dont pay overpriced hotels center highly recommended

Reviews.Title: “Perfect hotel,great location”

Reviews.Content: sister stayed sant elena converted convent hotel easy bought 3 day pass 33 euros caught actv 5 bus airport bus station 51 vaporetto sant elena journey hour short walk stop hotel quiet location lovely green modern hotel lovely beds extremely comfortable bathroom warm clean breakfast extensive choice juices cereals fruit cakes breads meats polite helpful unobstrusive internet free half hour advised getting airport heard actv strike hotel 30 mins walk canal st marks minutes vaporetto venice extremely easy 3 day pass meant able ride grand canal entirety visit murano extra paythe city clean hardly evidence litter safe late nightvery street vendors day 3 hour strike actv airport caught alilaguna ferry cost 13 euros hour weather february similar britain eating couple eating near rialto bridge coffee pizza 7 euros city break holiday
